I-94 NOT FOUND...?

Do you see NOT FOUND next to I-94 Information?

We strongly recommend you to RETRY. If your I-94 is still not found, please raise your hand.

 

Please select Yes and then click Submit to continue.

 

 

1. Use your passport to enter the following information.

2. Click on Get Most Recent I-94 after you have entered your information.
